titles.title: Born In A Stable, His Mother A Virgin

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Born in a stable, His mother a virgin
Raised in a carpenter's shop.
His people were slaves; His parents were poor;
His friends were a lowly lot.
His chances in life were very slim;
He's expected to be a slave.
But people in darkness saw a light in Him,
And the hope of freedom He gave.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
All of the power in heaven and earth
God has invested in Him.
He's to die on a cross, descend into hell,
Meet the devil, take the keys from him.
He yielded Himself to the death of the cross,
Cried it's finished and slumped to die.
In the regions of hell the devils celebrated,
We've destroyed the King, they cried.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
In the midst of the celebration, footsteps were heard
Walking the corridors of hell.
The shouting stopped when a voice rang out,
A voice that rang like a bell.
Satan then trembled as they recognized Him
Who came to deliver His own
Shut and lock those gates he cried
Don't let Him ascend to the throne.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
The the gates swung shut in the face of the King
To proved God's salvation untrue.
But He shook hell's gates and cried lift up your heads
The King is coming through.
Out of the devil's prison house came a procession
Led by the King, Shouting, now O grave where is thy victory
O death where is thy sting?
Who is this King of glory? The Lord God mighty in battle is He.
Who is this King of glory? The Master of the host of heaven.
Supreme. The one who not even death could stop.
Who is this King of glory?
The little boy from the carpenter's shop.
The little boy from the carpenter's shop.
The little boy from the carpenter's shop.
